transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Good evening sir, IndiaMART head office se baat kar raha hu. Aapne abhi helpline pe call kiya tha, bataiye sir.
Customer: Ji sir, mera abhi jo lead aa raha hai na mere ko.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan, wo mere paas jo lead aa raha hai na wo tijori ka aa raha hai. Regular mera furniture ka hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To regular jo lead hai na mere ko jo aane wala hai na wo lead nahi aa raha. Dusra lead baar baar aata ja raha hai, ek baar repeat ho raha hai. To uske liye kya kare sir wo? Jo regular lead nahi aata hai, bed ka wagera.
Executive: By-lead jo aapko show ho rahi hai wo kisi aur product ki ho rahi hai sir?
Customer: Aur product means ke wo jiski chahiye iski nahi mil rahi hai. To wo alag. Kiski chahiye sir?
Customer: Mere ko kya hai revolving chair, plastic chair us hisab se jo lead aaya na to acha hai. To lekin ye jo mera ek single product hai na uski lead jyada dikh rahi hai mere mein aa rahi hai.
Executive: Revolving chair aap search karenge to waha par by-lead aa rahi hai sir.
Customer: Haan, lekin isme setting mein kuch mistake nahi hoga na hua hoga isme kuch aisa kuch mistake nahi hoga?
Executive: Main check kar leta hu sir. Aap mobile phone se use karte hai ya laptop desktop se karte hai?
Customer: Nahi dono mein main karta hu abhi desktop mobile dono mein use karta hu main.
Executive: Abhi aap laptop pe available hai sir?
Customer: Haan haan laptop pe mere chalu hi hai.
Executive: Just a second.



Dekhiye aapko ek link aaya hoga IndiaMART ki taraf se aapki registered mail ID par. Usko join karke apne screen present kar dijiye IndiaMART ki. To main dekh paunga sir usko.
Customer: Mail mein mail pe link kiya?
Executive: Haan aapki mail pe aaya hoga sir.
Customer: Haan okay.

Join Google Meet. Okay. Ji.

Join to way. Okay join kiya maine. Mobile phone se join kiya aapne sir?
Customer: Nahi laptop mein join kiya. Achcha. Laptop se kiya hai to laptop mein aap jo hai jo emoji aapko dikh rahi hai na uske left side mein share screen ka ek option aa raha hoga sir.

Left side mein.
Executive: Aap laptop mein dekhiye samne ek reaction bana aa raha hai emoji. Emoji ek smile karta hua niche.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Uske left wala jo option hai wo present karne ka hai screen ko present. Uspe click kariye chhoti si window open ho gayi sir?
Customer: Ek minute wo hand raise wala wo bata raha hai. Okay okay. Nahi hand hand raise wala nahi.
Executive: Uske barabar mein CC karke likha hoga na?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: CC ke barabar mein ek emoji hoga uske left side mein upar ki taraf ek box ke andar ek arrow bana hoga upar. Kiya kiya maine dekho kiya maine.
Customer: Haan lekin wo aapka ek single hi wo hai wo entire screen aapko share karna hai. Usko cancel karke dobara se re-screen screen share kariye sir.
Executive: Okay cancel.

Stop sharing pe click kariye.
Customer: Stop nahi aa raha isme.
Executive: Okay stop ho gaya. Abhi dobara se uspe click karenge na to entire screen aa raha hoga upar likha hua entire screen.
Customer: Haan entire screen okay.
Executive: Ji uspe click karke niche share kariye usko.

Customer: Show my screen. Show my screen hai mere liye. Abhi IndiaMART open kariye aap.

Jaise hi aap uspe click karenge na waha pe haan abhi show ho raha hai sir. IndiaMART pe jaiye IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir wapas se aapne stop sharing pe click kar diya wo. Dobara se share kariye.

Executive: Jaise abhi aapne share kiya tha bilkul aise hi dobara se share kariye.
Executive: Haan abhi left side mein jo welcome to seller IndiaMART likha hua dikh raha hai aapko?
Customer: Left side sabse upar sabse upar sabse upar.
Executive: Aur upar sir sabse upar kone mein chale jaiye bilkul left side mein welcome to seller IndiaMART upar aur upar karo aur. Aur upar karo aur upar.
Customer: Haan uspe click kariye.
Executive: Haan abhi ye aapka IndiaMART open ho gaya hai sir.
Customer: Haan ye main ab isme by-lead section pe aap chale jaiye.
Customer: Haan ji. Thik hai ab isme mujhe bataiye kaunsi by-lead aapko jyada dikh rahi hai?
Customer: Haan na abhi tijori ki sabse jyada aa rahi hai. Aur chair ki kam aa rahi hai. Ye tijori wali jo hai na wo lead bahut jyada aa rahi hai mere mein.
Executive: Steel almira wagera.
Customer: Haan almira ki sabse jyada aa rahi hai mere mein. Mud mud ke aa rahi hai aur kafi inquiry aa rahi hai dusri aane ki wajah.
Executive: Aisa hoga sir uska customer jyada aa raha hoga. Koi baat nahi aap ek kaam kariye to aap upar chale jaiye sabse upar jaiye. Jab bhi kabhi aap by-lead use kare to aap jo hai pehle to sabse pehle aap mujhe ye bataiye ki aap pure pan India deal karte hai ya Gujarat mein hi karte hai keval?
Customer: Nahi abhi to main Gujarat kar raha hu. Abhi to main Gujarat hi kar raha hu.
Executive: Chaliye koi baat nahi aap Gujarat select kariye upar aur yaha pe aap dekhiye ki abhi kuch by-lead jo hai aapko revolving chair jo aap bata rahe the yaha category select kariye aap ek baar. Bataiye yaha pe category select kahan hai?
Executive: Niche likha hua revolving chair, plastic chair.
Customer: Haan chalo main click click kiya revolving chair ka. Haan. Abhi kya hoga ki dekhiye retail lead bhi isme dikhegi lekin jab tak aap usko consume nahi karenge do char by-lead ek hafte mein agar do by-lead bhi aap revolving chair ki consume karte hai to fir agar revolving chair ki koi requirement IndiaMART se Gujarat state se aayegi to wo dikhegi aapko turant.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: TrustSeal service mein yahi hota hai ki koi bhi by-lead agar aap weekly consume kar rahe hote hai wo product aapka sabse jyada aapko dikhega isme. Dusri baat ye hai. Achcha ye hai sir maine search kiya wo sabse jyada dikh raha hoga aisa bol raha hai.
Executive: Haan almira jo hai na aapne kahin na kahin jyada search kar liya hoga is wajah se wo jyada aapko dikh raha hai. Otherwise to aap yaha pe kya kar sakte hai ki jaise abhi aapne revolving chair select kiya hai usko hataiye aap. Haan.
Customer: Dusra plastic chair kar do.
Executive: Haan matlab sare ek sath bhi select kar sakte hai aap. Plastic chair kar dijiye.
Customer: Okay sare select kar sakta hu na main?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji. Steel almira chhod dijiye.
Customer: Haan chhod deta hu. Haan ye ab aap dekh lijiye yaha pe aapki category jo aapne select kari hai us hisab se aapke yaha par dekhiye abhi just Gujarat Surat se and safe sofa ki requirement abhi aayi hai zero second. Hmm hmm. Abhi customer online hi baitha hoga. Hmm hmm.
Executive: Nahi koi baat nahi chalo main ye check karunga. Ji. Aur kuch setting mein change karne ki jarurat nahi hai na?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir main ek bar jo internally agar kuch hoga to main karwa dunga update. Baki aapke paas aapke account manager Sparshi Verma ka number nahi hai kya sir? Haan number hai mere paas lekin uska mobile switch off aa raha hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha achcha. Koi baat nahi sir. To aapne helpline pe call kiya koi dikkat nahi hai. Koi lekin jab aap helpline pe call karte hai na to hamare paas ek concern raise ho jata hai sir. Thik hai? To agar aapki permission ek concern raise ho jata hai ticket open ho jata hai ek aapka. Haan. Aapne abhi 969696 pe call kiya tha na pehle? Haan haan. Ji. To agar aapki permission hai to usko close kar sakta hu main? Haan sharing wala na?
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Nahi kya close karne ki baat kar rahe hai aap?
Executive: Main keh raha hu jab kabhi bhi aap helpline number pe call karte hai sir to hamare paas ek concern raise ho jata hai ki bhai aapne helpline pe call kari to kuch na kuch issue hoga aapko. Wo issue resolve karne ke liye hum aapse connect karte hai. Abhi main us concern ko to close kar sakta hu na sir? Achcha achcha. Haan haan kar kar kar dijiye sir ji koi baat nahi. Main concern close karunga aap mere resolution se satisfied hai sir? Yes yes sir. To aapke paas sir ek mail aayega abhi just jaise hi main close karta hu usko abhi do minute ke andar andar aap please usme satisfied mark kar dijiyega agar aap satisfied hai to. Okay thank you. Thik hai? Thank you so much sir have a nice day. Thank you for calling IndiaMART.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Receiving more leads for safes than chairs.



Resolution:

- Executive provided guidance on category selection.

- Suggested consuming buyleads weekly for better results.

- Will internally check for any issues.

- Closed the customer's helpline ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark 'satisfied' in email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, revolving chair, almira, settings
